settings.text: Use this text to share information about your brand with your customers. Describe a product, share announcements, or welcome customers to your store.

settings.title: Reorder Steps
settings.text:
1. Go the the product listing for the product that you would like to reorder.

2. Choose your quantity for that product.

3. In the "Special Instructions" let us know the order # (if you have it) and the name of the recipe you would like to reorder.

4. Add to cart and check out.

Tips:
* If you would like to change anything from the previous order let us know in the special instructions

* If you would like to add or change a title you can use the "Add Title Above Recipe" field
